headline: Devon Q2 Earnings & Sales Beat Estimates, Production Guidance Raised
summary: DVN beat second-quarter earnings and sales estimates, raises 2025 production guidance and cut capital spending again.

headline: LandBridge Announces Long-Term Surface Use and Pore Space Reservation Agreement with Devon Energy
summary: HOUSTON, August 06, 2025--LandBridge Company LLC (NYSE: LB) ("LandBridge") today announced it has executed a 10-year surface use and pore space reservation agreement with Devon Energy Corp. (NYSE: DVN) ("Devon") to support Devon’s operations in the core of the New Mexico Delaware Basin. Under the agreement, LandBridge will provide Devon with 300,000 barrels per day (bpd) of pore space capacity on its East Stateline Ranch and Speed Ranch surface acreage. The pore space reservation will commence i

headline: Devon Energy Beats Q2 Guidance and Boosts Output Forecast
summary: Devon Energy delivered second-quarter results that surpassed production expectations, raised its full-year output forecast, and trimmed capital spending for the second consecutive quarter as part of a broader optimization strategy.
